listitem.para: oVirt Engine requires Fedora 17 or higher. Complete successful installation of the operating system prior to commencing installation of the oVirt Engine.

Virtualization hosts must run oVirt Node 6.3, Fedora 17, or a later edition of Fedora. Where Fedora hosts are to be used it is expected that you have completed installation of the operating system prior to commencing installation of the oVirt Engine.
Installation of the Fedora Node is, however, covered in this guide. More detailed information is also available in the Fedora - Node Deployment Guide.
